Age of first cigarette

*Tobacco experimentation at 14 and daily consumption at 15.

question.title: What is the typical age when most people start smoking?

option_a.title: At 10 years old
option_a.description: Some people start smoking as early as 10 years old

option_b.title: At 12 years old
option_b.description: Many people start smoking at around 12 years old

option_c.title: At 14 years old
option_c.description: Tobacco experimentation often begins at 14, but daily consumption may not start until later

option_d.title: At 16 years old
option_d.description: Some studies suggest that most people start smoking at 16 years old
